Detailed Description

Class describing the relationship between regions, which region that contains which and so on.

This is a lazy implementation which makes use of the ItemIDTree even if the RegionIDTree does not need to save two uint32 values for each region. This could be fixed when it is really necessary.

See also:
ItemIDTree
